page.title: 10BEL MOONEY
page.content: Bel Mooney is married to Jonathan Dimbleby.She is really an author, but has a job as a journalist too. She loves broadcasting, but likes writing best.She has written children's books, but prefers writing for adults.She started to write books in l978. Her first book was called "The Year of the Child"_portraits of British Children. She only broadcasts in England,inter_ viewing interesting people. Bel Mooney came to live in Glebe House in Swainswick. Glebe House was built as a farmhouse in the Cl8th, it had a thatched roof. It became a Rectory in Cl9th. The first Rector was John Earl, he had 8 children. Every time his wife had a child he added on to the house.It was a Rectory until the l960's when it was sold and a new Rectory built.She enjoys working in her Study with its lovely views.
